alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 01 at 11:28PM CST until February 02 at 7:26AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Cross Bayou At Cross Lake affecting Caddo Parish. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THIS WEEKEND... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Cross Bayou At Cross Lake. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 172.7 feet. - Forecast...A secondary crest is forecast to develop on Cross Lake, cresting near 175 feet by this weekend. - Flood stage is 173.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 173.2 feet on 05/01/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 730 AM CST.
